name: starter-kit
description: This is a Node and React starter template

scripts.install-all: npm i && cd client && npm i
scripts.start-mon: concurrently --names "server,client" -c "bgGreen.bold,bgBlue.bold" "nodemon server/src/index.js " "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.build-deploy: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && npm run create-zip

author: sbendalam
